text: Robert Evans (June 29, 1930 - October 26, 2019) was an American movie producer and studio executive. He was best known for his work on Rosemary's Baby, Love Story, The Godfather, and Chinatown. Evans died on October 26, 2019 at his home in Beverly Hills, California from stroke-related problems at the age of 89.Robert Evans, ‘Chinatown’ Producer and Paramount Chief, Dies at 89 ==References== ==Other websites== * * Robert Evans web show on JumpBoxTV * Life Magazine profile on Robert Evans, published March 7, 1969 * Robert Evans Official Site The official site of legendary Hollywood producer Robert Evans Category:1930 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Movie producers from New York (state) Category:Businesspeople from New York City
title: Robert Evans
